dmca.title: [ABUSE] cease and desist
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005 1:21 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] cease and desist




-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Synergy4Designs@aol.com <Synergy4Designs@aol.com>
To: webmaster@porksguide.com
Date: Thursday, February 10, 2005, 5:25:18 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] cease and desist

===8<==============Original message text===============
To whom is may concern:
I am sending an email to request all Images of "synergy", 'Liss"  to  be 
deleted off your site and or server. These images have a copywright on file
under 
synergyonfire and have a clause that if no permission is given a lawsuite
of 
this nature could cost you $30,000. for each Image used and posted. Among  
other charges including but not limited to slander, Image theft and abuse.If

this is not complied with within 48 hours we will proceed with charges
againts  
this site and your server 
ThePlanet.com
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX
75207
attn:Peter Pathos
1214-782-7800
 
IP address 70.84.10.98
copy sent to law offices of 
Hettinger and Hettinger
S.Westnedge
Kal, MI 49002

===8<===========End of original message text===========
